fields.name: colleagues
fields.title: Colleagues
fields.description: A colleague of the person.

fields.name: workLocation
fields.title: Work Location
fields.description: A contact location for a person's place of work.

fields.name: children
fields.title: Children
fields.description: A child of the person.

fields.name: jobTitle
fields.title: Job Title
fields.description: The job title of the person (for example, Financial Manager).

fields.name: birthPlace
fields.title: Birth Place
fields.description: The place where the person was born.

fields.name: gender
fields.title: Gender
fields.description: Gender of the person. While http://schema.org/Male and http://schema.org/Female may be used, text strings are also acceptable for people who do not identify as a binary gender.

fields.name: memberOf
fields.title: Member Of
fields.description: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.

fields.name: alumniOf
fields.title: Alumni Of
fields.description: An organization that the person is an alumni of.

fields.name: homeLocation
fields.title: Home Location
fields.description: A contact location for a person's residence.

fields.name: birthDate
fields.title: Birth Date
fields.description: Date of birth.

fields.name: givenName
fields.title: Given Name
fields.description: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person. This can be used along with familyName instead of the name property.

fields.name: familyName
fields.title: Family Name
fields.description: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of an Person. This can be used along with givenName instead of the name property.

fields.name: honorificPrefix
fields.title: Honorific Prefix
fields.description: An honorific prefix preceding a Person's name such as Dr/Mrs/Mr.

fields.name: additionalName
fields.title: Additional Name
fields.description: An additional name for a Person, can be used for a middle name.

fields.name: siblings
fields.title: Siblings
fields.description: A sibling of the person.

fields.name: affiliation
fields.title: Affiliation
fields.description: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

fields.name: honorificSuffix
fields.title: Honorific Suffix
fields.description: An honorific suffix preceding a Person's name such as M.D. /PhD/MSCSW.

fields.name: nationality
fields.title: Nationality
fields.description: Nationality of the person.

fields.name: follows
fields.title: Follows
fields.description: The most generic uni-directional social relation.

fields.name: knows
fields.title: Knows
fields.description: The most generic bi-directional social/work relation.

fields.name: worksFor
fields.title: Works For
fields.description: Organizations that the person works for.

fields.name: user
fields.title: User
fields.description: A user associated with this person.
